help.basedOnProgress: Based on your current progress, here's what we recommend:
help.personalizedHelpDescription: Get personalized help based on where you are in your journey

quickTips.tip1: Start with your most important documents first
quickTips.tip2: Add at least one trusted guardian
quickTips.title: Quick Tips

addGuardians.description: Set up trusted people who can access your information in emergencies

steps.1: Click 'Add Guardian' in the Secure section
steps.2: Enter your guardian's full name and relationship
steps.5: Send them an invitation to accept their role

addGuardians.title: Add Your First Guardian

createWill.description: Generate a basic will document based on your information

steps.5: Download and have it properly witnessed

createWill.title: Create Your Will

designateBeneficiaries.description: Specify who should receive your assets and in what proportions

steps.1: Click 'Add Beneficiary' in the Transfer section

designateBeneficiaries.title: Designate Beneficiaries

listAssets.description: Document your properties, accounts, and valuable possessions

steps.1: Click 'Add Item' in the Organize section
steps.2: Choose the asset type (property, vehicle, account, etc.)
steps.3: Enter the asset name and details
steps.5: Save the asset to your inventory

listAssets.title: List Your Assets

uploadDocuments.description: Learn how to securely upload and organize your important documents

steps.1: Click the 'Upload Document' button in the Organize section
steps.2: Select your document file from your computer
steps.3: Choose the document type and add a descriptive name
steps.4: Set an expiration date if applicable
steps.5: Save the document to your secure vault

uploadDocuments.title: Upload Your First Document

q1.answer: Da, varnost je na≈°a najvi≈°ja prioriteta. Uporabljamo ≈°ifriranje od konca do konca in arhitekturo niƒçelnega zaupanja, kar pomeni, da nobena nepoobla≈°ƒçena oseba ne more dostopati do va≈°ih podatkov, niti mi. Vsi podatki so shranjeni v varnih podatkovnih centrih v Evropski uniji v skladu z GDPR.
q1.question: Je LegacyGuard varen?

q2.answer: Po preklicu ostanejo va≈°i podatki varno shranjeni v naƒçinu samo za branje 90 dni. V tem obdobju lahko kadarkoli ponovno aktivirate svojo naroƒçnino in si povrnete polni dostop. Po 90 dneh bodo va≈°i podatki varno in trajno izbrisani iz na≈°ih sistemov.
q2.question: Kaj se zgodi z mojimi podatki, ƒçe prekliƒçem naroƒçnino?

q3.answer: Skrbnik je zaupanja vredna oseba (npr. partner, brat/sestra ali pravni strokovnjak), ki ji odobrite poseben, omejen dostop do va≈°ih informacij za nujne primere. Skrbnik ne more spreminjati va≈°ih podatkov; lahko jih samo pregleduje, da ukrepa v skladu z va≈°imi navodili.
q3.question: Kaj je 'Skrbnik'?

q4.answer: Trezor dedi≈°ƒçine je mesto, kjer varno shranjujete vse svoje pomembne dokumente in sredstva. Priroƒçnik za pre≈æivele je izbran nabor najpomembnej≈°ih stikov, dokumentov in navodil iz va≈°ega trezorja, zasnovan tako, da imajo va≈°i skrbniki vse bistveno na enem mestu.
q4.question: Kak≈°na je razlika med 'Trezorjem' in 'Priroƒçnikom'?

q5.answer: LegacyGuard vam pomaga pripraviti in organizirati vse temelje in informacije za va≈°o oporoko. Vendar pa v veƒçini evropskih dr≈æav digitalni dokument ne nadome≈°ƒça potrebe po uradnem, podpisanem (in pogosto notarsko overjenem) dokumentu. Priporoƒçamo, da se o konƒçni razliƒçici vedno posvetujete s pravnim strokovnjakom.

stats.satisfactionLabel: feel more prepared and in control

1.highlight: ‚ú® Set up in just 2 hours, protecting 3 children and spouse
1.name: Michael K.
1.quote: After my brother's sudden accident, I watched my sister-in-law struggle for weeks to find important documents and passwords. That's when I knew I couldn't let the same thing happen to my family. Now everything is organized, and my wife knows exactly where to find what she needs. Being prepared and in control is priceless.

2.highlight: üíº Business and personal life organized in one secure place
2.name: Anna S.
2.quote: As a single mom running a business, I worried constantly about what would happen if something happened to me. Heritage Vault helped me organize everything - from business accounts to my children's school information. My sister now has access to everything she'd need to step in. I sleep so much better knowing they're protected.

3.highlight: ‚ù§Ô∏è 40 years of family history preserved and protected
3.name: Thomas R.
3.quote: My wife has early-stage dementia, and I realized I needed to prepare while I still could. Heritage Vault made it simple to organize our 40 years of life together. Our children now have clear instructions and access to everything. It's brought our whole family closer knowing we're prepared for whatever comes.
